head.openGraphTitle: Freeze, Delay and Deconstruct – Sound Design with Spectral Time
head.openGraphDescription: In his latest video, Seed to Stage explores the Spectral Time device introduced in Live 11, walking you through its many sonic possibilities to create a myriad of trippy sounds, from metallic, glitched-out stutters to washed-out ambience and head-flipping stereo effects.

loginRegister.title: Log in
loginRegister.quote: Why do I need to log in?
loginRegister.helpTxt: To use any version of Live (including Live Lite or our free trial) you need an Ableton account. It takes less than a minute to create one, and even less to log in if you already have one.

createAccount.title: Register
createAccount.subtitle: New Customer? Please create an account.
createAccount.helpTxt: Your account lets you authorize and download Live plus your included library content.

createAccountLabel.firstNameSubTxt: So that we know what to call you if we email you.
createAccountLabel.name: Last Name

createAccountNewsletter.newsletterTxt: Sign up to the Ableton newsletter to stay up to date with the latest special offers, tutorial videos, downloads, surveys and other news.
createAccountNewsletter.newsletterTxtFollow: It’s free and you can unsubscribe at any time. Further information is available in our
